entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpj4m7fm37\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0085.9363] The element us-gaap:DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet with a value 68,200,000 does not appear in a calculation defined in the filing. This concept is a balance sheet item and should appear on the balance sheet or as a component of a balance sheet item in the footnotes. If this value is the amount with jurisdictional netting and it is reported in the footnotes then the value of DeferredTaxLiabilities (the amount without jurisdictional netting) should also be reported. To resolve the error the element DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet needs to either be included with the Balance Sheet Location Axis or be included in a calculation with Liabilities as an ancestor.
Period :2019-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9363 Rule version: 11.0.1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1638833/000163883319000074/sgry-20190930.xml 3555

[DQC.US.0085.9363] The element us-gaap:DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet with a value 64,600,000 does not appear in a calculation defined in the filing. This concept is a balance sheet item and should appear on the balance sheet or as a component of a balance sheet item in the footnotes. If this value is the amount with jurisdictional netting and it is reported in the footnotes then the value of DeferredTaxLiabilities (the amount without jurisdictional netting) should also be reported. To resolve the error the element DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet needs to either be included with the Balance Sheet Location Axis or be included in a calculation with Liabilities as an ancestor.
Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9363 Rule version: 11.0.1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1638833/000163883319000074/sgry-20190930.xml 3554
